channel.title: Weapon speed?
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me how to change the weapon speed? on my server when I attack a monster and leave it auto attack it takes ages till it attacks again?
any ideas how to make it it attacks faster when you leave it without clicking again?
Thanks, LittleMaffia.
